This message appears to advise the user that a restart is necessary
Concept.String: To activate your modifications, please restart the unit.

Concept.Comments: Message shown on saving a configuration
Concept.String: Modifications will be available after starting a new exam

Concept.Comments: This message appears to advise the user that a shutdown will start automatically
Concept.String: To activate your modifications, a full shutdown will start on save.

Concept.Comments: This message appears after pressing the save preset button, to advise the user that a shutdown will be performed. The user can accept or cancel the save operation.
Concept.String: To activate your modifications, a full shutdown will start. Would you like to continue saving the configuration?

Concept.Comments: This message appears to advise the user that a shutdown will start as soon as the button SAVE will be pressed
Concept.String: Pressing save a full shutdown will start automatically.

Occurs when machine resolution is different from preset resolution, for example when user connect a monitor with low resolution to the 7400 machine
Concept.String: The system has detected a graphic low resolution. The system will be automatically switched off. Check if a low resolution device is connected to the HDMI connector

Concept.Comments: without hardware key, this message occurs when machine resolution is different from preset resolution, for example when user connect a monitor with low resolution to the machine
Concept.String: The system has detected a current genearal setup preset resolution different from machine resolution. The preset resolution will be set on the machine and the system will be automatically switched off. Check if a low resolution device is connected to the HDMI connector

Concept.Comments: with a hardware key connected, this message occurs when machine resolution is different from preset resolution, for example when user connect a monitor with low resolution to the machine
Concept.String: The system has detected a current genearal setup preset resolution different from machine resolution. Check if a low resolution device is connected to the HDMI connector

Concept.Comments: without hardware key, this message occurs when a wired network interface is not detected on MyLab X8 or MyLab 9
Concept.String: The wired network interface is missing so the system will be automatically switched off

Concept.Comments: with a hardware key connected, this message occurs when when a wired network interface is not detected on MyLab X8 or MyLab 9
Concept.String: The wired network interface is missing

Concept.Comments: control panel, the label of the combo box relative to user interface fit mode (or window appearance mode)
Occurs when the inserted Date is not valid
Occurs when user change date-time and current exam is open
Concept.String: CURRENT EXAM IS OPEN:IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO CHANGE THE DATE-TIME

Concept.Comments: Occurs when the system fails to set the UTC Time Zone
Occurs when the system fails to set the Date and Time automatically
Concept.String: ERROR IN SETTING AUTOMATIC DATE AND TIME

Concept.Comments: Occurs when the system cannot reach the NTP Server because of bad connection or wrong server name
Concept.String: INVALID NTP SERVER NAME OR BAD CONNECTION

Concept.Comments: Occurs when the system fails to set the NTP Server
